Key Match Events: Volpe hit a sacrifice fly to left, allowing Chisholm Jr. to score.
Tauchman hit a two-run single in the first inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Jameson Taillon allowed only one run in six innings and earned the win for the Chicago Cubs.
Gerrit Cole took the loss for the New York Yankees.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Wrigley Field in Chicago, Illinois.
